attributes.action: Follow up on petition to assist student pilots raise sufficient funding for training.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After reading the petition to assist student pilots gain the same access to funding as Doctors and Lawyers through thier training, your response was to seek a Career Develpment Loan as it is classed as Vocational training. A medical student wants to become a Doctor as a Vocation. We want to become Pilots as a Vocation. It costs about the same to train approx £60 to £80k. There is a worldwide shortage of pilots and just about every other country has a program to assist students reach their target. A CDL of £8k doesnt help much. As you tax fuel and travellers so much, we urge you to give some of it back!
